Pre-Game Insights: Ochai Agbaji is out with a left hip pointer injury.
Agbaji has been a picture of health for the Raptors this season, suiting up for all 37 games up to this point.
The Raptors are 8-29 and in the midst of a three-game losing streak.
The Cleveland Cavaliers are on an 11-game winning streak and sit at 32-4.
Agbaji has averaged career-highs in points (10.8), rebounds (3.8), assists (1.8), steals (0.8) and three-point percentage (40.4 per cent).
Guard Davion Mitchell (left calf contusion) has been listed as probable.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Action tips off at 7 p.m. ET / 4 p.m. PT on Sportsnet One and Sportsnet+.
The Raptors are set to take on the East-leading Cleveland Cavaliers.
